Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Don Lemon made the quoted statement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Don Lemon was not on air on the day the alleged statement was made.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by attributing a false quote to Don Lemon.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Don Lemon made the statement without any evidence or confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the meme and quote were manipulated to create a false narrative.
